meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hammy.
meanings.sent1: Her hamminesses on stage always make the audience smile.
meanings.sent2: The actor's hamminesses were evident in his exaggerated gestures.
meanings.sent3: The hamminesses of the comedian added a touch of humor to the show.
meanings.sent4: His hamminesses shone through, making his performance unforgettable.
meanings.sent5: The hamminesses of the character made the play lively and entertaining.

meanings.definition: The exaggerated or over-the-top behavior characteristic of a ham actor.
meanings.sent1: The actress's hamminesses were amusing to watch.
meanings.sent2: His hamminesses on stage were met with mixed reviews.
meanings.sent3: The hamminesses of the clown brought laughter to the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her hamminesses were like a bright spotlight on the stage.
meanings.sent5: The hamminesses of the performer were larger than life, captivating the audience.
